mapper.select:
/* select_02 */
WITH tb0 AS ( SELECT dtlcod, muluse1 FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '20' AND dtlcod <> '_' ) SELECT a.*, ' ' issave, DECODE (rot_type, 'L*B', garo, 'B*L', sero, 'L*D', garo, 'D*L', nopi, 'B*D', sero, 'D*B', nopi) wid, DECODE (rot_type, 'L*B', sero, 'B*L', garo, 'L*D', nopi, 'D*L', garo, 'B*D', nopi, 'D*B', sero) len, '' as xyposition FROM ( SELECT t1.ship_no, t1.block, t5.areagrp, t4.jbngrp, t6.objidr, 0 jbnx, 0 jbny, 0 smaxy, t1.jibun, 'G' fix_stat, '' est_outdt, 'A' tp_appdir, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(t2.ctipoint,LENGTH(t2.ctipoint),1) <> ';' THEN t2.ctipoint||';' END ctipointa, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(t2.ctipoint,LENGTH(t2.ctipoint),1) <> ';' THEN t2.ctipoint||';' END ctipointb, t5.stx hhistartx, t5.sty hhistarty, 999 waitday, t1.blkdirgbn, t1.blkdir_longi blkdirtsx, t1.blkdir_lati blkdirtsy, '' blockdescr, null status, ' ' orderinf, ' ' dn, ' ' orderinf2, ' ' dn2, 'normal' blkstats, ' ' gship, ' ' gblock, '' blockschstat, '' blockschstat2, t1.sorn ship_nogubun, 'N' pegubun, '' fjibungbn, '_' transstatus, DECODE(TRIM(t7.block), '', 'N', 'Y') memoyn, t7.usercont memotxt, t7.wgs84_longi memox, t7.wgs84_lati memoy, t7.garo memog, t7.sero memos, NVL(TRIM(t7.ynhide), 'Y') memohyn, null cur_pro, null nxt_pro, '' itemdescr, '' itemprocess, '' itemplaninfo, 'S' shipgubun, -- 블록 배경색 (정반, 비호선은 똥색) CASE WHEN t1.sorn IN ('J', 'N') THEN '250,198,77' -- 똥색 ELSE ( SELECT muluse1 FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' /* HJ::: AND dtlcod = (SELECT DECODE(pkg_pm07e210.f_get_block_stage_fast(t1.ship_no, t1.block), ▼ 1 line change */ AND dtlcod = (SELECT DECODE('72', '41', 'C711', '42', 'C711', '72', 'C712', '70', 'C713','80', 'C713','90', 'C713', '7N', 'C714', 'A0', 'C715', 'C601') FROM dual) ) END block_bak_color, -- 블록 테두리색 (SELECT muluse1 FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' AND dtlcod = 'C602') block_lne_color, --블록 테두리 굵기 (SELECT muluse1 FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' AND dtlcod = 'C603') block_lne_thick, --블록 글자색 (SELECT muluse1 FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' AND dtlcod = 'C606') block_txt_color, -- 블록 글자 폰트 (SELECT 'Tahoma' FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' AND dtlcod = 'C607') block_txt_font, -- 블록 글자 크기 (SELECT muluse1 FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' AND dtlcod = 'C608') block_txt_size, -- 블록 글자 STYLE (SELECT muluse1 FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' AND dtlcod = 'C609') block_txt_style, -- 블록 배경색 (표준색, 이동 탑재 유무체크 표현시 초기화에 사용) (SELECT muluse1 FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' AND dtlcod = 'C601') block_bak_color_basic, -- dashstyle (5: 일반블록, 1: 가상블록) '5' dashstyle, t1.plateid, t1.garo, t1.sero, t1.nopi, t1.wgt, t1.rot_type, t1.erect_yn, 'P' as curgbn, t1.stocksdte, -100 as orderid FROM pm07_d20 t1 JOIN ( SELECT T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK, SUBSTR(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(T1.HHIX ||','|| HHIY, ';')), 2) CTIPOINT FROM ( SELECT T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK, T1.SEQNO, T2.JIBUN, T2.MFG_IND, T1.WGS84_LONGI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6') WGS84_LONGI, ROUND(T1.WGS84_LATI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'LA') * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6'), 15) WGS84_LATI, T1.WGS84_LONGI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6') HHIX, ROUND(T1.WGS84_LATI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'LA') * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6'), 15) HHIY, T4.AREAGRP, T3.JBNGRP FROM PM07_D30 T1 JOIN PM07_D20 T2 ON T1.SHIP_NO = T2.SHIP_NO AND T1.BLOCK = T2.BLOCK AND NOT (T1.WGS84_LONGI IS NULL AND T1.WGS84_LATI IS NULL) JOIN PM07_A70 T3 ON T2.JIBUN = T3.JIBUN AND T2.MFG_IND = T3.MFG_IND AND T3.YNUSE = 'Y' JOIN PM07_E30 T4 ON T3.JBNGRP = T4.JBNGRP AND T4.AREAGRP = #{areagrp} JOIN PM07_A75 T5 ON T3.JIBUN = T5.JIBUN AND T3.MFG_IND = T5.MFG_IND JOIN PM07_E10 T6 ON T4.AREAGRP = T6.AREAGRP WHERE T2.CURGBN = 'P' AND (T6.MFG_IND1 = #{mfgInd} OR T6.MFG_IND2 = #{mfgInd}) AND (T6.MFG_IND1 = T3.MFG_IND OR T6.MFG_IND2 = T3.MFG_IND) AND (CASE WHEN T2.MFG_IND <> 'C' AND (T1.WGS84_LONGI IS NULL OR T1.WGS84_LATI IS NULL) THEN 'X' ELSE 'O' END) = 'O' ) T1 GROUP BY T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK, T1.JIBUN, T1.MFG_IND CONNECT BY PRIOR T1.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO - 1 AND PRIOR T1.SHIP_NO = T1.SHIP_NO AND PRIOR T1.BLOCK = T1.BLOCK START WITH T1.SEQNO = 1 ) T2 ON T1.SHIP_NO = T2.SHIP_NO AND T1.BLOCK = T2.BLOCK JOIN PM07_A70 T3 ON T1.JIBUN = T3.JIBUN AND T1.MFG_IND = T3.MFG_IND AND T3.YNUSE = 'Y' JOIN PM07_E20 T4 ON T3.JBNGRP = T4.JBNGRP JOIN PM07_E30 T5 ON T4.JBNGRP = T5.JBNGRP AND T5.AREAGRP = #{areagrp} LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.JBNGRP OBJIDB, MAX(A.OBJID) OBJIDR /* HJ::: FROM PM07_E50 A, PM07_E20 B ▼ 1 line change */ FROM (SELECT '5-F-07' OBJIDB, '10' OBJID, 'B' PGRP, 'R' OBJTYP FROM DUAL) A, PM07_E20 B WHERE A.OBJTYP = 'R' AND B.JBNGRP = 'B' AND A.PGRP = B.JBNGRP GROUP BY B.JBNGRP ) T6 ON T4.JBNGRP = T6.OBJIDB -- 블록과 묶여있는 정반은 화면에 단독으로 그리지 않는다. LEFT JOIN PM07_D50 T7 ON T1.SHIP_NO = T7.SHIP_NO AND T1.BLOCK = T7.BLOCK WHERE T1.CURGBN = 'P' AND (T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK) NOT IN (SELECT 'J00000' SHIP_NO, PLATEID BLOCK FROM PM07_D20 WHERE CURGBN = 'P' AND PLATEID IS NOT NULL) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PM07_D30 WHERE T1.SHIP_NO = SHIP_NO AND T1.BLOCK = BLOCK AND (WGS84_LATI = 0 OR WGS84_LONGI = 0) AND ROWNUM = 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PM07_A75 WHERE T1.JIBUN = JIBUN AND T1.MFG_IND = MFG_IND AND (WGS84_LATI = 0 OR WGS84_LONGI = 0) AND ROWNUM = 1) UNION ALL -- 신청블록중 현지번에 없는 블록 SELECT T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK, T5.AREAGRP, T4.JBNGRP, '' OBJIDR, 0 JBNX, 0 JBNY, 0 SMAXY, T3.JIBUN, 'G' FIX_STAT, '' EST_OUTDT, 'A' TP_APPDIR, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PM07_D37 WHERE ORDERID = T1.ORDERID ) = 4 THEN (SELECT LISTAGG(WGS84_LONGI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6') || ',' || ROUND(WGS84_LATI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'LA') * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6'), 15), ';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SEQNO) FROM PM07_D37 WHERE ORDERID = T1.ORDERID GROUP BY ORDERID) ELSE /* HJ::: pkg_pm07common.get_display_points({mfgInd}, pkg_pm07common.getpointjibuncenter(t1.mfg_ind, NVL((SELECT REAL_JIBUN FROM PM07_A70 WHERE GBN4 = 'Y' AND YNUSE = 'Y' AND JIBUN = DECODE(T1.TRANSTATUS, 'T', T1.MOVJBN, T1.CURJBN) ), DECODE(T1.TRANSTATUS, 'T', T1.MOVJBN, T1.CURJBN) ), pkg_pm07common.f_ret_blk_size_l_pm07(t1.ship_no, t1.block, t1.block), pkg_pm07common.f_ret_blk_size_b_pm07(t1.ship_no, t1.block, t1.block))) */ null END) AS CTIPOINTA, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PM07_D37 WHERE ORDERID = T1.ORDERID ) = 4 THEN (SELECT LISTAGG(WGS84_LONGI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6') || ',' || ROUND(WGS84_LATI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'LA') * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6'), 15), ';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SEQNO) FROM PM07_D37 WHERE ORDERID = T1.ORDERID GROUP BY ORDERID) ELSE /* HJ::: pkg_pm07common.get_display_points({mfgInd}, pkg_pm07common.getpointjibuncenter(t1.mfg_ind, NVL((SELECT REAL_JIBUN FROM PM07_A70 WHERE GBN4 = 'Y' AND YNUSE = 'Y' AND JIBUN = DECODE(T1.TRANSTATUS, 'T', T1.MOVJBN, T1.CURJBN) ), DECODE(T1.TRANSTATUS, 'T', T1.MOVJBN, T1.CURJBN) ), pkg_pm07common.f_ret_blk_size_l_pm07(t1.ship_no, t1.block, t1.block), pkg_pm07common.f_ret_blk_size_b_pm07(t1.ship_no, t1.block, t1.block))) */ null END) AS CTIPOINTB, T5.STX HHISTARTX, T5.STY HHISTARTY, 999 WAITDAY, '' BLKDIRGBN, 0 BLKDIRTSX, 0 BLKDIRTSY, T1.BLOCK BLOCKDESCR, NULL STATUS, ' ' orderinf, ' ' dn, ' ' orderinf2, ' ' dn2, 'normal' blkstats, ' ' gship, ' ' gblock, '' blockschstat, '' blockschstat2, t1.sorn ship_nogubun, 'N' pegubun, '' fjibungbn, '_' transstatus, 'N' memoyn, '' memotxt, 0 memox, 0 memoy, 0 memog, 0 memos, 'y' memohyn, null cur_pro, null nxt_pro, '' itemdescr, '' itemprocess, '' itemplaninfo, 'S' shipgubun, -- 블록 배경색 (정반, 비호선은 똥색) CASE WHEN t1.sorn IN ('J', 'N') THEN '250,198,77' ELSE (SELECT muluse1 FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' AND dtlcod = 'C601' ) END block_bak_color, -- 블록 테두리색 (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM PM07_A10 WHERE MFG_IND = #{mfgInd} AND LRGCOD = 'PA' AND MIDCOD = '11' AND DTLCOD = 'C602') block_lne_color, -- 블록 테두리 굵기 (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM PM07_A10 WHERE MFG_IND = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' AND dtlcod = 'C603') block_lne_thick, -- 블록 글자색 (SELECT muluse1 FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' AND dtlcod = 'C606') block_txt_color, -- 블록 글자 폰트 (SELECT muluse1 FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' AND dtlcod = 'C607') block_txt_font, -- 블록 글자 크기 (SELECT muluse1 FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' AND dtlcod = 'C608') block_txt_size, -- 블록 글자 STYLE (SELECT muluse1 FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' AND dtlcod = 'C609') block_txt_style, -- 블록 배경색 (표준색, 이동 탑재 유무체크 표현시 초기화에 사용) (SELECT muluse1 FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = #{mfgInd} AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '11' AND dtlcod = 'C601') block_bak_color_basic, -- dashstyle (5: 일반블록, 1: 가상블록) '1' dashstyle, -- 계획 시점에는 다른 블록에 있을수 있어 공백 ' ' plateid, /* HJ::: pkg_pm07common.f_ret_blk_size_l_pm07(t1.ship_no, t1.block, t1.block) garo, pkg_pm07common.f_ret_blk_size_b_pm07(t1.ship_no, t1.block, t1.block) sero, pkg_pm07common.f_ret_blk_size_d_pm07(t1.ship_no, t1.block, t1.block) nopi, pkg_pm07common.f_ret_blk_wt_pm07(t1.ship_no, t1.block) wgt, ▼ 4 line change */ 15 garo, 15 sero, 2 nopi, 200 wgt, 'L*B' rot_type, 'N' erect_yn, 'X' as curgbn, null as stocksdte, t1.orderid FROM PM07_C20 T1 JOIN PM07_A70 T2 ON DECODE(T1.TRANSTATUS, 'T', T1.MOVJBN, T1.CURJBN) = NVL(T2.JIBUN, T2.REAL_JIBUN) AND T1.MFG_IND IN (T2.MFG_IND, (CASE WHEN T2.MFG_IND = '1' THEN '7' WHEN T2.MFG_IND = '7' THEN '1' END)) JOIN PM07_A70 T3 ON NVL(T2.REAL_JIBUN, T2.JIBUN) = T3.JIBUN AND T2.MFG_IND = T3.MFG_IND AND T3.YNUSE = 'Y' JOIN PM07_E20 T4 ON T3.JBNGRP = T4.JBNGRP JOIN PM07_E30 T5 ON T4.JBNGRP = T5.JBNGRP AND T5.AREAGRP = #{areagrp} WHERE T1.PLNWRKDTE = TO_DATE(#{plnwrkdte}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND #{plnwrkdte} IS NOT NULL AND TRANSTATUS IN ('W', 'M', 'T') AND T1.DELCOD <> 'X' AND CANDEL IS NULL AND T1.MFG_IND = #{tranMfgInd} AND T1.SU = 'S' AND T1.ORDERID = (SELECT MIN(ORDERID) FROM PM07_C20 WHERE MFG_IND = T1.MFG_IND AND SHIP_NO = T1.SHIP_NO AND BLOCK = T1.BLOCK AND PLNWRKDTE = T1.PLNWRKDTE AND SU = 'S') AND (T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK) NOT IN (SELECT SHIP_NO, BLOCK FROM PM07_D20 WHERE CURGBN = 'P' AND MFG_IND IN (T1.MFG_IND, (CASE WHEN T1.MFG_IND = '1' THEN '7' WHEN T1.MFG_IND = '7' THEN '1' END)) MINUS SELECT 'J00000' AS SHIP_NO, PLATEID FROM PM07_D20 X WHERE CURGBN = 'P' AND MFG_IND IN (T1.MFG_IND, (CASE WHEN T1.MFG_IND = '1' THEN '7' WHEN T1.MFG_IND = '7' THEN '1' END)) ) ) a ORDER BY CASE WHEN erect_yn = 'Y' THEN stocksdte ELSE null END ASC, CASE WHEN wid > len THEN wid ELSE len END DESC, ship_nogubun, ship_no, block

/* select_02_except_style */
WITH tb0 AS ( SELECT * FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = '1' AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '20' AND dtlcod <> '_' ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ' ' issave, DECODE (rot_type, 'L*B', garo, 'B*L', sero, 'L*D', garo, 'D*L', nopi, 'B*D', sero, 'D*B', nopi) wid, DECODE (rot_type, 'L*B', sero, 'B*L', garo, 'L*D', nopi, 'D*L', garo, 'B*D', nopi, 'D*B', sero) len, '' as xyposition FROM ( SELECT t1.ship_no, t1.block, t5.areagrp, t4.jbngrp, t6.objidr, 0 jbnx, 0 jbny, 0 smaxy, t1.jibun, 'G' fix_stat, '' est_outdt, 'A' tp_appdir, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(t2.ctipoint,LENGTH(t2.ctipoint),1) <> ';' THEN t2.ctipoint||';' END ctipointa, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(t2.ctipoint,LENGTH(t2.ctipoint),1) <> ';' THEN t2.ctipoint||';' END ctipointb, t5.stx hhistartx, t5.sty hhistarty, 999 waitday, t1.blkdirgbn, t1.blkdir_longi blkdirtsx, t1.blkdir_lati blkdirtsy, '' blockdescr, null status, ' ' orderinf, ' ' dn, ' ' orderinf2, ' ' dn2, 'normal' blkstats, ' ' gship, ' ' gblock, '' blockschstat, '' blockschstat2, t1.sorn ship_nogubun, 'N' pegubun, '' fjibungbn, '_' transstatus, DECODE(TRIM(t7.block), '', 'N', 'Y') memoyn, t7.usercont memotxt, t7.wgs84_longi memox, t7.wgs84_lati memoy, t7.garo memog, t7.sero memos, NVL(TRIM(t7.ynhide), 'Y') memohyn, null cur_pro, null nxt_pro, '' itemdescr, '' itemprocess, '' itemplaninfo, -- jbn,job_no 'S' shipgubun, '5' dashstyle, -- (dashstyle = 5 : 일반블록, 1 : 가상블록) t1.plateid, t1.garo, t1.sero, t1.nopi, t1.wgt, t1.rot_type, t1.erect_yn, 'P' as curgbn, t1.stocksdte, -100 as orderid FROM pm07_d20 t1 JOIN ( SELECT T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK, SUBSTR(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(T1.HHIX ||','|| HHIY, ';')), 2) CTIPOINT FROM ( SELECT T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK, T1.SEQNO, T2.JIBUN, T2.MFG_IND, T1.WGS84_LONGI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6') WGS84_LONGI, ROUND(T1.WGS84_LATI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'LA') * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6'), 15) WGS84_LATI, T1.WGS84_LONGI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6') HHIX, ROUND(T1.WGS84_LATI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'LA') * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6'), 15) HHIY, T4.AREAGRP, T3.JBNGRP FROM PM07_D30 T1 JOIN PM07_D20 T2 ON T1.SHIP_NO = T2.SHIP_NO AND T1.BLOCK = T2.BLOCK AND NOT (T1.WGS84_LONGI IS NULL AND T1.WGS84_LATI IS NULL) JOIN PM07_A70 T3 ON T2.JIBUN = T3.JIBUN AND T2.MFG_IND = T3.MFG_IND AND T3.YNUSE = 'Y' JOIN PM07_E30 T4 ON T3.JBNGRP = T4.JBNGRP AND T4.AREAGRP = 'A100' JOIN PM07_A75 T5 ON T3.JIBUN = T5.JIBUN AND T3.MFG_IND = T5.MFG_IND JOIN PM07_E10 T6 ON T4.AREAGRP = T6.AREAGRP WHERE T2.CURGBN = 'P' AND (T6.MFG_IND1 = '1' OR T6.MFG_IND2 = '1') AND (T6.MFG_IND1 = T3.MFG_IND OR T6.MFG_IND2 = T3.MFG_IND) AND (CASE WHEN T2.MFG_IND <> 'C' AND (T1.WGS84_LONGI IS NULL OR T1.WGS84_LATI IS NULL) THEN 'X' ELSE 'O' END) = 'O') T1 GROUP BY T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK, T1.JIBUN, T1.MFG_IND CONNECT BY PRIOR T1.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO - 1 AND PRIOR T1.SHIP_NO = T1.SHIP_NO AND PRIOR T1.BLOCK = T1.BLOCK START WITH T1.SEQNO = 1 ) T2 ON T1.SHIP_NO = T2.SHIP_NO AND T1.BLOCK = T2.BLOCK JOIN PM07_A70 T3 ON T1.JIBUN = T3.JIBUN AND T1.MFG_IND = T3.MFG_IND AND T3.YNUSE = 'Y' JOIN PM07_E20 T4 ON T3.JBNGRP = T4.JBNGRP JOIN PM07_E30 T5 ON T4.JBNGRP = T5.JBNGRP AND T5.AREAGRP = 'A100' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.JBNGRP OBJIDB, MAX(A.OBJID) OBJIDR FROM (SELECT '5-F-07' OBJIDB, '10' OBJID, 'B' PGRP, 'R' OBJTYP FROM DUAL) A, PM07_E20 B WHERE A.OBJTYP = 'R' AND B.JBNGRP = 'B' AND A.PGRP = B.JBNGRP GROUP BY B.JBNGRP ) T6 ON T4.JBNGRP = T6.OBJIDB LEFT JOIN PM07_D50 T7 ON T1.SHIP_NO = T7.SHIP_NO AND T1.BLOCK = T7.BLOCK --LEFT JOIN PTB_STD_MFGIND T8 ON T8.MFG_IND = F_GET_NEXT_MFGIND_BTC(T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK, '1') WHERE T1.CURGBN = 'P' AND (T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK) NOT IN (SELECT 'J00000' SHIP_NO, PLATEID BLOCK FROM PM07_D20 WHERE CURGBN = 'P' AND PLATEID IS NOT NULL) -- 블록과 묶여있는 정반은 화면에 단독으로 그리지 않는다. AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PM07_D30 WHERE T1.SHIP_NO = SHIP_NO AND T1.BLOCK = BLOCK AND (WGS84_LATI = 0 OR WGS84_LONGI = 0) AND ROWNUM = 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PM07_A75 WHERE T1.JIBUN = JIBUN AND T1.MFG_IND = MFG_IND AND (WGS84_LATI = 0 OR WGS84_LONGI = 0) AND ROWNUM = 1) UNION ALL -- 신청블록중 현지번에 없는 블록 SELECT T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK, T5.AREAGRP, T4.JBNGRP, '' OBJIDR, 0 JBNX, 0 JBNY, 0 SMAXY, T3.JIBUN, 'G' FIX_STAT, '' EST_OUTDT, 'A' TP_APPDIR, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PM07_D37 WHERE ORDERID = T1.ORDERID ) = 4 THEN (SELECT LISTAGG(WGS84_LONGI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6') || ',' || ROUND(WGS84_LATI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'LA') * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6'), 15), ';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SEQNO) FROM PM07_D37 WHERE ORDERID = T1.ORDERID GROUP BY ORDERID) ELSE null END) AS CTIPOINTA, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PM07_D37 WHERE ORDERID = T1.ORDERID ) = 4 THEN (SELECT LISTAGG(WGS84_LONGI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6') || ',' || ROUND(WGS84_LATI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'LA') * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6'), 15), ';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SEQNO) FROM PM07_D37 WHERE ORDERID = T1.ORDERID GROUP BY ORDERID) ELSE null END) AS CTIPOINTB, T5.STX HHISTARTX, T5.STY HHISTARTY, 999 WAITDAY, '' BLKDIRGBN, 0 BLKDIRTSX, 0 BLKDIRTSY, T1.BLOCK BLOCKDESCR, NULL STATUS, ' ' orderinf, ' ' dn, ' ' orderinf2, ' ' dn2, 'normal' blkstats, ' ' gship, ' ' gblock, '' blockschstat, '' blockschstat2, t1.sorn ship_nogubun, 'N' pegubun, '' fjibungbn, '_' transstatus, 'N' memoyn, '' memotxt, 0 memox, 0 memoy, 0 memog, 0 memos, 'y' memohyn, null cur_pro, null nxt_pro, '' itemdescr, '' itemprocess, '' itemplaninfo, -- jbn,job_no 'S' shipgubun, '1' dashstyle, -- (dashstyle = 5 : 일반블록, 1 : 가상블록) ' ' plateid, -- 계획 시점에는 다른 블록에 있을수 있어 공백 15 garo, 15 sero, 2 nopi, 200 wgt, 'L*B' rot_type, 'N' erect_yn, 'X' as curgbn, null as stocksdte, t1.orderid FROM PM07_C20 T1 JOIN PM07_A70 T2 ON DECODE(T1.TRANSTATUS, 'T', T1.MOVJBN, T1.CURJBN) = NVL(T2.JIBUN, T2.REAL_JIBUN) AND T1.MFG_IND IN (T2.MFG_IND, (CASE WHEN T2.MFG_IND = '1' THEN '7' WHEN T2.MFG_IND = '7' THEN '1' END)) JOIN PM07_A70 T3 ON NVL(T2.REAL_JIBUN, T2.JIBUN) = T3.JIBUN AND T2.MFG_IND = T3.MFG_IND AND T3.YNUSE = 'Y' JOIN PM07_E20 T4 ON T3.JBNGRP = T4.JBNGRP JOIN PM07_E30 T5 ON T4.JBNGRP = T5.JBNGRP AND T5.AREAGRP = 'A100' WHERE T1.PLNWRKDTE = TO_DATE(20181224, 'YYYYMMDD') AND 20181224 IS NOT NULL AND TRANSTATUS IN ('W', 'M', 'T') AND T1.DELCOD <> 'X' AND CANDEL IS NULL AND T1.MFG_IND = '8' AND T1.SU = 'S' AND T1.ORDERID = (SELECT MIN(ORDERID) FROM PM07_C20 WHERE MFG_IND = T1.MFG_IND AND SHIP_NO = T1.SHIP_NO AND BLOCK = T1.BLOCK AND PLNWRKDTE = T1.PLNWRKDTE AND SU = 'S') AND (T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK) NOT IN (SELECT SHIP_NO, BLOCK FROM PM07_D20 WHERE CURGBN = 'P' AND MFG_IND IN (T1.MFG_IND, (CASE WHEN T1.MFG_IND = '1' THEN '7' WHEN T1.MFG_IND = '7' THEN '1' END)) MINUS SELECT 'J00000' AS SHIP_NO, PLATEID FROM PM07_D20 X WHERE CURGBN = 'P' AND MFG_IND IN (T1.MFG_IND, (CASE WHEN T1.MFG_IND = '1' THEN '7' WHEN T1.MFG_IND = '7' THEN '1' END)) ) ) a ORDER BY CASE WHEN erect_yn = 'Y' THEN stocksdte ELSE null END ASC, CASE WHEN wid > len THEN wid ELSE len END DESC, ship_nogubun, ship_no, block )

/* select_02_correct_lonlat */
WITH tb0 AS ( SELECT * FROM pm07_a10 WHERE mfg_ind = '1' AND lrgcod = 'PA' AND midcod = '20' AND dtlcod <> '_' ) SELECT T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK, T1.SEQNO, T2.JIBUN, T2.MFG_IND, T1.WGS84_LONGI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6') WGS84_LONGI, ROUND(T1.WGS84_LATI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'LA') * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6'), 15) WGS84_LATI, T1.WGS84_LONGI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6') HHIX, ROUND(T1.WGS84_LATI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'LA') * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6'), 15) HHIY, T1.WGS84_LONGI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6') WGS84_LONGI_except_correct, ROUND(T1.WGS84_LATI * (SELECT MULUSE1 FROM TB0 WHERE DTLCOD = 'Z6'), 15) WGS84_LATI_except_correct FROM PM07_D30 T1 JOIN PM07_D20 T2 ON T1.SHIP_NO = T2.SHIP_NO AND T1.BLOCK = T2.BLOCK AND NOT (T1.WGS84_LONGI IS NULL AND T1.WGS84_LATI IS NULL) JOIN PM07_A70 T3 ON T2.JIBUN = T3.JIBUN AND T2.MFG_IND = T3.MFG_IND AND T3.YNUSE = 'Y' JOIN PM07_E30 T4 ON T3.JBNGRP = T4.JBNGRP AND T4.AREAGRP = 'A100' JOIN PM07_A75 T5 ON T3.JIBUN = T5.JIBUN AND T3.MFG_IND = T5.MFG_IND JOIN PM07_E10 T6 ON T4.AREAGRP = T6.AREAGRP WHERE T2.CURGBN = 'P' AND (T6.MFG_IND1 = '1' OR T6.MFG_IND2 = '1') AND (T6.MFG_IND1 = T3.MFG_IND OR T6.MFG_IND2 = T3.MFG_IND) AND (CASE WHEN T2.MFG_IND <> 'C' AND (T1.WGS84_LONGI IS NULL OR T1.WGS84_LATI IS NULL) THEN 'X' ELSE 'O' END) = 'O'

/* select_02_1 */ SELECT T1.SHIP_NO, T1.BLOCK, T1.PLATEID, T7.ITEMDESCR, T7.MFG_IND FROM PM07_D20 T1 JOIN PM07_A70 T3 ON T1.JIBUN = T3.JIBUN AND T1.MFG_IND = T3.MFG_IND AND T3.YNUSE = 'Y' JOIN PM07_E20 T4 ON T3.JBNGRP = T4.JBNGRP JOIN PM07_E30 T5 ON T4.JBNGRP = T5.JBNGRP AND T5.AREAGRP = #{areagrp} LEFT JOIN PM07_D81 T7 ON T1.SHIP_NO = T7.SHIP_NO AND T1.BLOCK = T7.BLOCK WHERE T1.CURGBN = 'P'
